connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a IPA server.

method.description: Name of IPA command to be executed.

password.description: Optional override of the IPA password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

server.description: Optional override of the IPA server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

session.description: Login session cookie. If empty then username/password will be used to login prior to running this operation

username.description: Optional override of the IPA username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).

verify_ssl.description: Verify SSL certificates on the server
